Package com.chess.engine.board

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chess.engine.board.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyTile, OccupiedTile
    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to define a chess board tile
    Author:
    antho

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​EmptyTile> EMPTY_TILES_CACHE
      All the empty tiles that will ever exist are described in this map so that, if we ever want to use one of them we don't need to create them.
      protected int tileCoordinate
      The coordinate of the tile : it goes from 0 to 63

    • Field Detail

      • tileCoordinate

        protected final int tileCoordinate
        The coordinate of the tile : it goes from 0 to 63

      • EMPTY_TILES_CACHE

        private static final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​EmptyTile> EMPTY_TILES_CACHE
        All the empty tiles that will ever exist are described in this map so that, if we ever want to use one of them we don't need to create them. This way we implement immutability.
